item.title: Help making Tutorial Island script
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

I’ve just started on a tut island script. I have some really useful things for you guys in there. Here is a list of useful things in it:

findmsarrow will return true or false for whether or not its found the arrow in the main screen, and will record the arrows coordinates to x,y.
findmmarrow does the same for the arrow, but for the minimap.
findmsarrowinbox does the same for the arrow in the main screen, but within a box.
clickmmarrow will find the mm arrow and click on it.
findmmredarrow will find the red arrow on the minimap.
talktoguide1 will find the guide (with the yellow arrow above him/her) and click on him/her. It will the talk until the guide has nothing more to say.
opendoor1 will open any door with a yellow arrow above it
justcont will keep clicking on the blue continue until the person has no more to say.

Currently I’ve not tested the whole script, but it should get up to just having killed a rat.

Known bugs:
Clicking on a fire with shrimp takes ages (will put in right click)
Doesn’t always walk to the middle of the mining cave
When mining rocks, sometimes cant find the text ‘ine’.

[scar]program m0u53m4tsTutIsland;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\Skill\fighting.scar}

var
acceptdtm,msarrowdtm,mmarrowdtm,fishspotdtm,treedtm,firedtm,burntshrimpdtm,
redarrowdtm,pickdtm,copperdtm,daggerdtm,shielddtm: integer;
ran1,left,right,m: integer;
startplayer: integer;
tries: integer;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
StartPlayer:= 0
HowManyPlayers :=1; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer:=StartPlayer; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

 Players[0].Name :='';
 Players[0].Pass :='';
 Players[0].Nick :='';
 Players[0].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[0].Skill:='';
 Players[0].Active:=True;

 Players[1].Name :='';
 Players[1].Pass :='';
 Players[1].Nick :='';
 Players[1].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[1].Skill:='';
 Players[1].Active:=True;

 Players[2].Name :='';
 Players[2].Pass :='';
 Players[2].Nick :='';
 Players[2].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[2].Skill:='';
 Players[2].Active:=True;

 writeln('You currently have'+inttostr(HowManyPlayers)+' players set to run.');

end;

procedure setupbmps;
begin
acceptdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA63FCC4C0C020C3C880020E3030F003299’ +
‘0E87F2060FC88450D14C04401329606ED’);
msarrowdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA638C666460F0036224F0EBBB12033F900’ +
‘689FE070246901A1F4C350C50352000006BD7098A’);
mmarrowdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA639466666048666440058C0CAC60128A4’ +
‘16A9250D5FCFA2EC5C0059507010054BC0324’);
fishspotdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA63EC646460B0046224B0E2C47B8600200’ +
‘D12FD0F048C5D986A2273A7318840D5800000869109A9’);
treedtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA63B4656460B002622450D1E1CCC007A44’ +
‘1A2FF8180D10E534D4185095C0D0800001F74076F’);
firedtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA6334646460E8016224F07C8B0E831C900’ +
‘689FE0702462320AB1755CDFEB9AA70352000005EDA0905’);
burntshrimpdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA63F464666038CFC8800CC203031980A20’ +
‘C20D1FF40C008527301550D489615AA0604003C07073C’);
redarrowdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA639CC3C4C020CC8002FE033150948111C’ +
‘40602C6F9986A40B2303520000017C6066A’);
pickdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA63F46462605066644006FA0A0C0CAC401’ +
‘A24FA1F0818BD30D504DAABC2D5800000E32005EE’);
copperdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA639CC3C4C0A0C5C8800C16C4683270026’ +
‘990E87F200000372005F6’);
daggerdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA632C626260D067644006F3E7723088006’ +
‘990E87F206004A9D1435563A824C020075503020028D90721’);
shielddtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA6374666260F06164000116060870D6110’ +
‘0B341A2FF8180D111A8C68B910119182A3231B042D5800000F457’ +
‘0601’);
end;

procedure lost;
begin
writeln(players[currentplayer].name)
logout
nextplayer(false)
loginplayer
end;

procedure ranclothes;
begin
if finddtm(acceptdtm,x,y,2,2,515,335)= false then lost
ran1:= 10+random(30)
for m:= 1 to ran1 do
begin
left:=random(10)
right:=random(10)
if left >= right then mouse(52+(random(2)*112),90+(random(7)*36),10,7,true)
if right > left then mouse(350+(random(2)*112),96+(random(5)*36),10,7,true)
end
finddtm(acceptdtm,x,y,2,2,515,335)
mouse(x,y,10,5,true)
wait(200)
highestangle
end;

function justcont : boolean;
begin
result:= false
repeat
wait(1000)
if findcolortolerance(x,y,16711680,232,442,292,450,10) then
begin
mouse(x+random(30),y,3,3,true)
result:= true
end
mmouse(8+random(482),348+random(80),5,5)
wait(100)
until findcolortolerance(x,y,16711680,232,442,292,450,10) = false
end;

function findmsarrow : boolean;
begin
tries := 0
repeat
wait(random(100))
if finddtm(msarrowdtm,x,y,6,6,515,335) then
begin
result := true
break
end
tries:= tries + 1
until(tries > 8)
if tries > 8 then result:= false
end;

function findmsarrowinbox(xe,ye,xs,ys : integer) : boolean;
begin
tries := 0
repeat
wait(random(100))
if finddtm(msarrowdtm,x,y,xe,ye,xs,ys) then
begin
result := true
break
end
tries:= tries + 1
until(tries > 8)
if tries > 8 then result:= false
end;

function findmmarrow : boolean;
begin
tries := 0
repeat
wait(random(100))
if finddtm(mmarrowdtm,x,y,MMX1, MMY1, MMX2, MMY2) then
begin
result := true
break
end
tries:= tries + 1
until(tries > 8)
if tries > 8 then result:= false
end;

procedure clickmmarrow;
begin
tries := 0
repeat
wait(200)
tries := tries + 1
if tries > 10 then lost
until findmmarrow = true
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
flag
end;

function findmmredarrow : boolean;
begin
tries := 0
repeat
wait(random(100))
if finddtm(redarrowdtm,x,y,MMX1, MMY1, MMX2, MMY2) then
begin
result := true
break
end
tries:= tries + 1
until(tries > 8)
if tries > 8 then result:= false
end;

procedure talktoguide1;
begin
tries := 0
repeat
repeat
sendarrowsilentwait(1,200+random(50))
mmouse(random(515),random(335),3,3)
findmsarrow
mmouse(x,y+20,3,3)
tries := tries +1
if tries > 5 then clickmmarrow
until(option2(‘alk-to’))
mouse(x,y+20,3,3,false)
until ClickOption(‘alk-to’,1)
flag
justcont
makecompass(‘N’)
end;

procedure opendoor1;
begin
tries := 0
repeat
repeat
repeat
mmouse(random(515),random(335),3,3)
while finddtm(msarrowdtm,x,y,6,6,515,335) = false do wait(200)
mmouse(x,y+20,10,10)
tries := tries +1
if tries > 7 then
begin
findobj(x,y,‘pen Door’,867671,10)
end
until(option2(‘Open Door’))
mouse(x,y+20,3,3,false)
until ClickOption(‘pen’,1)
flag
until findmsarrow = false
end;

procedure opendoor2;
begin
tries := 0
makecompass(‘N’)
repeat
repeat
repeat
mmouse(random(515),random(335),3,3)
while finddtm(msarrowdtm,x,y,6,6,515,335) = false do wait(200)
mmouse(x,y+20,3,3)
tries := tries +1
if tries > 8 then lost
wait(50)
until(option2(‘Open Door’))
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,false)
wait(50)
until ClickOption(‘pen’,1)
flag
wait(7000)
until findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,9542812,384,171,405,183,30)
end;

procedure opendoor3;
begin
tries := 0
makecompass(‘S’)
repeat
repeat
repeat
mmouse(random(515),random(335),3,3)
while finddtm(msarrowdtm,x,y,6,6,515,335) = false do wait(200)
mmouse(x,y+20,3,3)
tries := tries +1
if tries > 8 then lost
wait(50)
until(option2(‘Open Door’))
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,false)
wait(50)
until ClickOption(‘pen’,1)
flag
wait(7000)
until findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,667459,384,171,405,183,30)
end;

procedure chopping;
begin
tries := 0
repeat
mouse(650,183,5,5,true) //openbag
tries:= tries +1
if tries > 8 then lost
until findcolortolerance(x,y,346218,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,5) //sees stuff in invent
tries:= 0
repeat
repeat
repeat
if findmsarrow = true then
begin
tries := tries + 1
if tries > 10 then lost
mmouse(random(515),random(335),20,20)
wait(20+random(10))
mmouse(x+1+random(2),y,3,3)
wait(1000+random(50))
end
until option2(‘hop down’)
mouse(x+5+random(2),y,3,3,false)
until clickoption(‘hop down’,1)
flag
wait(10000)
until findcolortolerance(x,y,5143974,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,10)
justcont
end;

function findskills : boolean;
begin
tries := 0
repeat
wait(random(100))
if findcolortolerance(x,y,46336,577, 174, 594, 195,10) then
begin
result := true
break
end
tries:= tries + 1
until(tries > 8)
if tries > 8 then result:= false
end;

procedure makefire;
begin
repeat
tries := 0
repeat
tries := tries + 1
if tries > 8 then lost
if findcolortolerance(x,y,5143974,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,10) then mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
until findcolortolerance(x,y,16777215,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,10)
tries := tries + 1
if tries > 8 then lost
if findcolortolerance(x,y,9671840,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,10) then
begin
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
wait(10000)
end
until findskills = true
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)

mmouse(643,188,2,2)
clickmouse(643,188,true)
end;

procedure fishing;
begin
repeat
repeat
makecompass(‘S’)
repeat
wait(200)
until finddtm(fishspotdtm,x,y,MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
until option2(‘et Fish’)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
flag
wait(7000)
until findcolortolerance(x,y,6390982,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,33)
makecompass(‘N’)
end;

procedure IdleMouseMan(MsTime : Integer);//procedure since you don’t need to return anything.
var
nx, ny, sparex, sparey, PreScriptSpeed, ran1, ran2 : Integer;
begin
MarkTime(Mark);//Time count starts.
PreScriptSpeed:= MouseSpeed;
MouseSpeed:= 30 + random(10); //More Random.
nx:= 250 + random(200) - random(200); //don’t forget the ‘;’.
ny:= 130 + random(150) - random(150);
Mmouse(nx, ny, 5, 5);
repeat //You don’t need begins all the time.
ran1:= 0
ran2:= 0
if(random(8) >6) or (nx < 250)then
ran1:= 1;
if(random(8) >6) or (ny < 160)then
ran2:=1;
if ran1= 0 then
nx := nx - random(200); //Standerize.
if ran1= 1 then
nx := nx + random(200);
if ran2= 0 then
ny := ny - random(200);
if ran2= 1 then
ny := ny + random(200);
Mmouse(nx, ny, 1, 1);
if(random(10) = 1) then
if(FindColorTolerance(sparex, sparey, 13885662, 76, 6, 104, 21, 15) or FindColorTolerance(sparex, sparey, 3572696, 76, 6, 104, 21, 15))then
begin
Mouse(nx, ny, 3, 3, false);
Wait(1000 + random(2000))
if(random(2) = 1)then
Mmouse(nx, ny + 50 + random(70), 15, 15);
end;
until(TimeFromMark(Mark) >= MsTime)//Stops when miliseconds is up.
MouseSpeed:= PreScriptSpeed;
end;

procedure chopburncook;
begin
repeat
if findcolortolerance(x,y,6390982,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,33) = false then
begin
repeat
repeat
repeat
wait(200)
until finddtm(fishspotdtm,x,y,MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
until option2(‘et Fish’)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
flag
wait(7000)
until findcolortolerance(x,y,6390982,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,33)
end

repeat
idlemouseman(1000+random(500))
until(finddtm(firedtm,x,y,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2))

repeat
findcolortolerance(x,y,6390982,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,33)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
finddtm(firedtm,x,y,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
until option2(‘Fire’)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
flag
wait(7000)
until findmmarrow
repeat
if finddtm(burntshrimpdtm,x,y,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2) then
begin
mouse(x,y,3,3,false)
clickoption(‘rop Bur’,2)
end
until finddtm(burntshrimpdtm,x,y,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2) = false
end;

procedure clickmmarrow2;
begin
makecompass(‘N’)
tries := 0
repeat
wait(200)
tries := tries + 1
if tries > 10 then lost
until findmmarrow = true
mouse(x+5,y,3,3,true)
flag
end;

procedure opengate;
begin
repeat
repeat
wait(1000)
findobj(x,y,‘Open’,341593,10)
wait(50)
until option2(‘pen Gate’) = true
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
flag
wait(3000)
until findmsarrow = false
end;

procedure cookingtut;
begin
repeat
talktoguide1
wait(500)
until findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,8544352,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2,30)
repeat
makecompass(‘W’)
findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,8544352,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2,30)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
wait(300+random(50))
findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,14474465,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2,12)
mmouse(x,y,3,3,true)
wait(500)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
wait(1000)
until findmsarrow
repeat
repeat
findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,7049618,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2,20)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
until findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,16777215,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2,5)
repeat
findmsarrow
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
until option2(‘Range’)
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(5000)
until findcolortolerance(x,y,621989,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2,16)
makecompass(‘N’)
mouse(740,482,3,3,true)
end;

procedure walktoquest;
begin
repeat
clickmmarrow
opendoor1
until findmsarrow = false
repeat
wait(100)
setrun(true)
wait(500)
until findmmredarrow = true
repeat
findmmredarrow
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
flag
until findmmarrow = true
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
flag
opendoor3
end;

procedure questguy;
begin
talktoguide1
mouse(614,186,3,3,true)
wait(500)
talktoguide1
makecompass(‘S’)
repeat
repeat
findmsarrow
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
until option2(‘limp’)
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
flag
wait(2000)
until findmsarrow = false
end;

procedure walktomining;
begin
makecompass(‘N’)
mouse(645,139,3,3,true)
wait(5000)
flag
clickmmarrow
talktoguide1
end;

procedure prospect;
begin
repeat
repeat
repeat
mmouse(random(515),random(335),20,20)
findmsarrow
mmouse(x,y+5,3,3)
wait(100)
until option2(‘Mine’)
wait(100)
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,false)
wait(200)
until clickoption(‘rospect’,1)
flag
wait(3000)
until justcont
end;

procedure accmine;
begin
repeat
clickmmarrow
flag
until findmsarrow = true
prospect
repeat
mouse(653,185,3,3,true)
clickmmarrow
talktoguide1
until finddtm(pickdtm,x,y,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2)
repeat
repeat
findmsarrow
mmouse(x,y+10,3,3)
wait(100)
until option2(‘ine’)
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,false)
wait(300)
until clickoption(‘ine’,1)
flag
wait(10000)
justcont
clickmmarrow
repeat
repeat
findmsarrow
mmouse(x,y+10,3,3)
wait(100)
until option2(‘ine’)
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,false)
wait(300)
until clickoption(‘ine’,1)
flag
wait(10000)
repeat clickmmarrow until findmsarrow = true
repeat
repeat
if finddtm(copperdtm,x,y,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2) then mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
until findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,16777215,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2,7)
makecompass(‘N’)
findmsarrow
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
flag
wait(10000)
until findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,2836316,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2,9)
end;

procedure smelt;
begin
repeat
repeat
repeat
if findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,1453119,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2,4) then mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
until findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,16777215,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2,7)
findmsarrow
mmouse(x-2,y+6,3,3)
wait(50)
until option2(‘Anvil’)
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
flag
wait(1500)
until findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,16777215,11,76,35,88,10)
repeat
findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,16777215,11,76,35,88,10)
mmouse(x+2,y-15,3,3)
until option2(‘onze dagg’)
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(5000)
end;

procedure miningtut;
begin
walktomining
prospect
accmine
repeat
repeat clickmmarrow until findmsarrow
talktoguide1
wait(300)
until findmsarrow = false
end;

procedure walktofight;
begin
repeat clickmmarrow until findmsarrow
repeat
repeat
wait(1000)
findobj(x,y,‘pen Ga’,6776690,10)
wait(50)
until option2(‘pen Gate’) = true
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
flag
wait(3000)
until findmsarrow = false
flag
wait(3000)
clickmmarrow
end;

procedure wield;
begin
repeat
repeat
wait(1000)
mouse(683,184,4,4,true)
wait(1000)
mouse(652,187,4,4,true)
until finddtm(daggerdtm,x,y,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
wait(2000)
until findmsarrow
end;

procedure wield2;
begin
repeat
repeat
wait(500)
until finddtm(daggerdtm,x,y,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
wait(500)
until option2(‘nze swo’)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
repeat
repeat
wait(500)
until finddtm(shielddtm,x,y,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
wait(500)
until option2(‘den shi’)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
wait(1000)
mouse(558,187,3,3,true)
wait(200)
mouse(585,184,3,3,true)
end;

procedure entercage;
begin
clickmmarrow
repeat
repeat
wait(1000)
findobj(x,y,‘pen Ga’,6776690,10)
wait(50)
until option2(‘pen Gate’) = true
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
flag
wait(3000)
until (findmsarrow=false) or (findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,6765885,x-10,y,x+20,y+40,20) = true)
end;

procedure fightrat;
begin
repeat
repeat
repeat
findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,6371641,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2,10)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
wait(100)
until option2(‘ttack’)
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,false)
wait(100)
until clickoption(‘ttack’,1)
until infight = true
repeat wait(1000) until infight = false
end;

procedure leavecage;
begin
end;

begin
setupsrl

item.title: Help making Tutorial Island script
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

I found the only way for finding the arrows is something like this (probably doesn’t work, but you’ll get the idea):
for c = 1 to 50
wait(5)
if findbitmaptolerancein(blahblah) then c = 50 //find the arrow (could use dtm)
next c

That would probably do it, but I just typed it out here, so you may need to change bits. Im also not sure if scar supports the For function. Meh. You get the idea.

item.title: Help making Tutorial Island script
item.dc:creator: @Boreas Boreas
item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

Thank you derek. I am also pretty new. I think I will do some more organizing and post another version and create a list of problems that need to be solved. That way anyone that wants to help can pick something. Also we will be able to check things off to show progress. I’ve got a lot of reading to do, plus work for my real life job, so it may be a while.

For anyone that wants to help:

Basically there’s three parts to this. The first is that we need to go through tutorial island very carefully and figure it exactly what needs to be done to do tutorial island, right down to the details (like how many times you click “click here to continue” when talking to an npc). The more times we do this, and the more people that do this, the more we can make the script handle anything smoothly. This is sort of a list of instructions that you could follow, thinking for yourself and using problem solving skills. The second part is taking these instructions and adding details like failsafes so that a computer that can’t think for itself can follow. The third part is turning these instructions into code that scar can read by finding existing and creating new procedures and functions that suit the needs of the instructions. Each part is different, so no matter your scripting level, I’m sure you’ll be able to contribute.

(Note: For a lot of scripters 1 and 2 melt together, 2 and 3 melt together, or even all 3 for the Neo’s who can just “see the code” :P. Also, I didn’t include debugging and improving etc.)

Adding this here because it won’t fit in first post:

TESTERS WANTED: no scripting knowledge needed
Just follow the instructions in the following script like you would for autoing
This script will create screenshots with all the info I need. All you have to do
is the run script on tutorial island and then send me the screenshots it creates!

[scar]program TutIslandTestScript1;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{Thank you for being a tester for the Tutorial Island Script. This script
will make testing very easy because it takes screenshots and makes reports.

This particular Test Script tests isuptext. If testing goes well, isuptext
will be used to search for words displayed in the top left corner of the screen
when the mouse is over certain things.

As you go through Tutorial Island, a flashing arrow on the main screen will be
next to object like the following:
Doors
Gates
NPCs
Furnace
Mining Spots
Anvils
Range

When you put the mouse over these things, text is displayed in the top left
corner. You may notice that the first part of the text is white, such as ‘Open’
or ‘Close’ and the second part is colored. You will be using the second part
as the word that isuptext searches for, also known as the search word.

Everytime you run this script, it will create a screen shot that will tell me
where on tutorial island you were when you ran the script, the rotation of the
minimap, what object you are testing, and the text displayed in the top left.
The filename of the screen shot will tell me your tester name, the search word
you used, and whether isuptext found the search word in the text displayed in
the top left.

Make sure that none of the scar window is over the runescape window.

Running a test
On line 70 change Anonymous to your testing name. This is the name that will
be in the thanks to section of the tutorial island script. You may leave this at
Anonymous if you wish. This also allows me to see who are the best testers, who
can be trusted with testing other things in the future.
In tutorial island, go to a place where the flashing arrow on the main screen
is prompting you to click an object or person.
Move the mouse over that object or person and take note of what it says in the
top left. Take note of the colored part of the text as I mentioned above.
On line 71 change searchword for part of or all of the colored text.
Drag the cross hairs onto the runescape window.
Make sure the mouse is above the object and the text is displayed in the top left.
Hit F9 to run the script.

The script will create the screen shot and display a message below.
If the message says that isuptext could not find the search word, make sure
that the search word is contained in the text displayed in the top left. If the
search word was bad, don’t bother sending me that screen shot, change the search
word, and try again. If the search word was good, then isuptext does not work in
that situation, this is the kind of thing I want to know (I also want to know
when it does work).

Now, with the same object, try moving you character to different positions,
and/or rotating the screen with the arrow keys and repeat the test. These
combinations will create different situations, so I can know which situations
work and which don’t work.

When you get bored of that object, move on through tutorial island and run more
tests on other things you are prompted to click on by the flashing arrow.

Screen shots will be save in the same folder as this script.

Send the screen shots and any questions or suggestions to boreas126@gmail.com.

Thanks again for being a tester
Boreas.
}
const
TesterName=‘Anonymous’;
SearchWord=‘searchword’;
var
diditwork: string;

begin
ActivateClient;
GetMousePos(x,y);
SetupSRL;
ClearDebug;
if isuptext(searchword)then
begin
writeln(‘isuptext found the search word in the top left’)
writeln(‘Now creating screen shot’)
diditwork:=‘true’
SaveScreenshot(TesterName+diditwork+inttostr(x)+‘I’+inttostr(y)+searchword+inttostr(random(1000))+’.bmp’)
end else
begin
writeln(‘isuptext did not find the search word in the top left’)
writeln(‘Now creating screen shot’)
diditwork:=‘false’
SaveScreenshot(TesterName+diditwork+inttostr(x)+‘I’+inttostr(y)+searchword+inttostr(random(1000))+’.bmp’);
end;
end.[/scar]

item.title: Help making Tutorial Island script
item.dc:creator: @Boreas Boreas
item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

Hi everyone. I want to make a script that does tutorial island for you. Eventually it will support multiple accounts, and maybe even make the accounts for you. But this is my first script so I’ll be very happy if it just works :p.

I am asking everyone to do me a favor, the next time you create a new character and go through tutorial island, please check if this is right. For example, when talking to NPCs, you click the blue words that say ‘click here to continue’ a number of times, and I need to make sure the number is correct. Another example is wait times, please note the maximum number seconds things like mining the tin takes. As you can see in the script, I need to know the names of the npcs. Also, as I said below in the problem section about isuptext, I need to know if theres anything around doors and gates that are the same color as the gate and door in the top left. I need more testers than usual because each character can only go through it once.

TESTERS WANTED! No scripting knowledge required. See 6th post below

As I said before, this is my first script so I really would appreciate help on the actual coding. I want this to use SRL but I don’t know all the procedures and functions. Please help by telling me what to use for something and why.

All coders and testers will get credit of course.

Notes-
Use SRL
Doesn’t need antirandom
Using antiban like smooth mouse, moving off screen etc just in case
0 color setup (because if the user has to go thru tut island it defeats the purpose)
checks to make sure things are working, backups, failsafes
since you only go thru tut island once per character, the user must be able to ‘set it and forget it’

Working on-
Procedure for finding flashing arrow
Organizing v0.03 and coding
RABBIT procedure
Scripts for testers that make reports and take screen shots
Easy stuff lol

Problems-
Anything that isn’t coded yet
Need good dtms for flashing arrow (mainscreen and minimap)
Recognizing when it says Talk-to in top left or Open Door etc
I did a test with isuptext upstairs in varrock general store. It worked when the word was ‘Open’
sometimes, but when I rotated the map so that the ‘Open’(which is white) was above something
white, it didn’t work. So I changed the word to ‘Door’ (which is blue) and it always worked
because there was nothing blue. So I will probably use ‘Door’ or ‘Gate’ as the word, but I need
people to make sure that there is nothing blue around all the doors and gates you have to go thru
in tutorial island, to make sure it won’t screw up. The same applies for ‘Talk-to’. It is white so I will
use the name of the npc which is yellow, again please tell me if theres anything yellow to mess it up.
Also, I need to know the names of the npcs to use as the words.
I’m having trouble with writing findaroundbigflash. First it will get the coordinates of the mainscreen
flashing arrow by calling findbigflash, then it will move the mouse around that area until the text
specified in the parameters is in the top left of the screen. As I said above, isuptext from srl should
work if used carefully. I found in srl\core\depreciated.scar several functions (FindObj…)that use
isuptext but which one should I use?
Also, should I make it walk to the flashing arrow an extra time right before findaroundbigflash to make it
easier for findaroundbigflash?
Should findminiflash and findbigflash be functions that return whether they found it?
Need to know time between checking for flashing arrow dtm (in case 1st check the arrow is ‘flashed off’)
Need skill specific things like finding a furnace, cooking ranging, anvil, fishing spot, mining spot, fire
As I said before, the user can’t setup colors for this
Where should it check itself? (can anticipate some of this, and some will come after tester reports)
Writing the findminiflash, findbigflash, and findaroundbigflash procedures
Everything lol

v0.01 -No actual code, just what happens. (draft)
v0.02-Same as 0.01 but drafted a few procedures and fixed inconsistencies (well the ones I could see)
v0.03-Did some organizing, started thanks to section and stuff at top,
started a couple procedures and functions, coded a little
[scar]program tutorialisland;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include Prometheus.scar} //NEED TO FINISH %%%%%

//MAYBE PUT A PICTURE HERE?? %%%%%
//
//Description: does tutorial island for you
//NEED TO FINISH %%%%%
//**************************************************************
//* Instructions *
//* NEED TO WRITE AFTER FINISHING CODE * %%%%%
//**************************************************************
//
//Sorry for all the comments. It’s partly so that I can remember what everything
//does (this is my first script) and hopefully others can learn from it.
//
//Thanks to:
//Kaitnieks-made SCAR
//Starblaster100-I decided to make this after using his awesome ess miner
//iloveit8-pointed out ClickToContinue in SRL
//Janilabo-put together Massive SCAR Learning Package
//SRL team in general, too many to name, tried to credit funcs and procs in code
//Tutorial writers-too many to name you all
//Mad Cow-Form Tut series and DTM Tut
//Akuma- Progress Report Tut
//s0lemn wishes-Failsafe and backup Tut
//XxKanexX-Array Tut

//
//v0.01-No actual code, just what happens. (draft)
//v0.02-Same as 0.01 but drafted a few procedures and
// fixed inconsistencies (well the ones I could see)
//v0.03-Did some organizing, started thanks to section and stuff at top,
// started a couple procedures and functions, coded a little

//Future updates- finish coding(that another list in itself :P)
// make mouse movements and waits more human like just in case
// multiple users
// creating accounts(might be a separate script)

//NOT FINISHED, needs good dtm, needs writing, needs testing %%%%%%
function FindMiniFlash : Boolean;
begin
//will find and click flashing arrow on minimap
// ClickMMDTM(DTM:integer)
// need dtm of minimap flashing arrow as integer
// will return false if cant find it
// need to use false result to move and try again?
end;

//procedure findbigflash
//will find and click the flashing arrow on main screen with dtm? %%%%%%

//procedure findaroundbigflash %%%%%%
//will find flashing arrow on main screen with dtm?
//will then search around arrow until it sees text in top left
//will use isuptext to find text in top left, need to test words that work
//using the white talk-to, close, open etc sometimes won’t work if there
//is white stuff around. So must use gate and door(unless theres blue stuff)
//and the names of people (unless theres yellow stuff)
//will then click that
//text in top left is choosen in params (open door, talk to etc)

//NOT FINISHED, needs testing, maybe add something that makes sure %%%%%
//‘click to continue’ has appeared
//perhaps (FindNpcChatText(‘continue’)-taken from ClickToContinue in SRL)
procedure NPCTalk (numofcons:integer);
begin
repeat
If (ClickToContinue)then
begin
numofcons:=numofcons-1
//Need wait time to make sure next one appears
end;
until (numofcons=0);
//will do ClickToContinue numofcons times with random waits in between
//ClickToContinue;//Handles ‘Click to continue’. Results True if found & handled.- From SRL AntiRandoms.scar by Masquerader
end;

//****************************************************************
//*********** Main Loop **********************************
//****************************************************************
begin

SetupSRL;
ActivateClient;
//customize character-not sure what I’m doing with this
//make highest point of view

//findaroundbigflash talk to
npctalk(5);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
findaroundbigflash(door);
findminiflash;

//look for red flag on mini map
//wait while there is flag
//then findbigflash should this be findaroundbigflash(name of npc)?
npctalk(2);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
GameTab(4); //From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
//wait
//////////////////////woodcutting///////////////////
findbigflash;
//check if wc is done by finding dtm of logs
//wait until done
/////////////////////////firemaking//////////////////
//find empty spot- need help with this!
UseItem(2); //SRL inventory.scar by RsN
//need procedure to simulate human reflex
UseItem(3); //From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
//click 588 190
//findbigflash
npctalk(2);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
//////////////////////////fishing/////////////////////
findminiflash;
//find fishing spot and click it- need help with this
//wait until says cooking your shrimp -need help with this
///////////////////////cooking///////////////////////////
GameTab(4); //Clicks Inventory Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
UseItem(4); //From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
//find fire- need help with this
//click fire
//wait
////////////////////////////fishing/////////////////////
//find fishing spot on minimap
//find and click fishing spot
//wait
////////////////////////cooking//////////////////////////////
//click 5th
//find fire
//click fire
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
findminiflash;
findbigflash;
findminiflash;
findbigflash;
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(5);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
UseItem(6); //Clicks Item in Iventory- From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
//need procedure to wait to simulate human reflex
UseItem(7); //Clicks Item in Iventory- From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
UseItem(8); //Clicks Item in Iventory- From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
////////////////////////cooking///////////////////////////
//need function to find range and return coords
//Click range use coords from above
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
GameTab(13); //From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
//wait
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash(‘Door’);
GameTab(12); //Clicks Run/Emotes Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
Mouse(620, 265, 5, 5, True); //Clicks run- From SRL MapWalk.scar in SetRun by RsN
//click 663 16
//click 645 13
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash(‘Door’);
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
ClickToContinue;
GameTab(3); //Clicks Quest Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(4);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
findbigflash;
//click 635 138 //click those coords humanlike
findminiflash;
findbigflash;
npctalk(3);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
/////////////////////////////mining//////////////////////
//search for color tin with mine rocks in top left
//right click and choose prospect
//wait til you can continue
ClickToContinue;
findminiflash;
//search for color copper with mine rocks in top left
//right click and choose prospect
//wait til continue
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(4);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
findminiflash;
findbigflash;
//search around big flasher for tin and mine it
//continue
findminiflash;
//search around big flasher for copper and mine it
//wait continue
/////////////////////////////smelting////////////////
findminiflash;
GameTab(4); //Clicks Inventory Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
UseItem(10); //Clicks Item in Iventory- From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
//need function to get coords of furnace near bigflash
//Click furnace with coords from above
//wait
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(3);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
////////////////////////smithing////////////////////////
findminiflash;
//find anvil around big flasher
//use 10th spot with anvil
//30 71 (or move around til says bronze dagger)
//wait
findminflash;
findaroundbigflash(gate);
//wait
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(4);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
GameTab(5); //Clicks Wield Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrl
//wait
GameTab(4); //Clicks Inventory Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
UseItem(10); //Clicks Item in Iventory- From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(2);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
UseItem(10); //Clicks Item in Iventory- From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
//need procedure to wait to simulate human reflex
UseItem(12); //Clicks Item in Iventory- From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
//need procedure to wait to simulate human reflex
GameTab(1); //Clicks Fight Mode Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash(‘ate’);
//look for giant rat color with attack giant rat in top left-need help!
//wait til says well done-need help!
//find and click open gate-need help! (theres no flashing arrow)
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(4);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
GameTab(4); //Clicks Inventory Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
//need procedure to wait to simulate human reflex
UseItem(12); //Clicks Item in Iventory- From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
//need procedure to wait to simulate human reflex
UseItem(13); //Clicks Item in Iventory- From SRL inventory.scar by RsN
//find dtm of best fence spot for ranging-need help!
//look for giant rat color with attack giant rat in top left-need help!
//wait to kill rat-how long?
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash(‘adder’);
//bank symbol-need help
//bank booth-need help
npctalk(1);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
//click yes
//click x to close bank screen
findaroundbigflash(‘Door’);
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(9);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
findaroundbigflash(‘Door’);
//click 644,154
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(2);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
GameTab(6); //Clicks Prayer Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(4);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
GameTab(8); //Clicks Friends Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
//wait-how long?
GameTab(9); //Clicks Ignore Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(8);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash(‘Door’);
//click 657,146
//click 704,93
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(2);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
GameTab(7); //Clicks Spell Menu- From SRL GameTab.scar by PPLSUQBAWLZ / Mutant Squirrle
npctalk(2);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
//click bottom of post in cage- need good dtm
////////////////////////////////////Magic///////////////////////
//cast wind strike
//find chicken-need help!
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
findminiflash;
findaroundbigflash({name of NPC, but who?}); //%%%%%
npctalk(1);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between
//click yes- need coords for this
npctalk(3);//See above Clicks ‘click to continue’ no. in param with waits in between

//now in lumby

end.
[/scar]

Read full topic
